ftbquests.data.data.title: Medieval Minecraft [FABRIC] 1.19.2
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.title: &3Magic
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests0.title: Create a &cRune Crafting Altar
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests0.subti: Using the &cRune Crafting Altar&r yields more &cRunes&r than a Crafting Table does.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests1.title: Craft a &cRune
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests1.subti: Used as ammo for &aSpells&r. &bSpell Infinity&r will let you cast spells without runes, but is incompatible with &bMending.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests2.title: Craft a &aNovice Wand
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests2.subti: Wands always have one spell built-in, so you can use them even without a tome.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests3.title: Create a &6Spell Binding Table
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests3.subti: Used to get more spells. Read the quest description for details.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests3.descr: To get more spells, place books into the &dSpell Binding Table&r to turn them into &bSpell Tomes&r.
After selecting a &bSpell Tome&r, place it back into the &dSpell Binding Table&r to select spells using lapis lazuli and XP
Adding bookshelves around the table gives access to stronger spells.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests4.title: Find a &3Wizard Merchant
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests5.title: Find or craft the four most powerful &aStaff&r variants
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests5.subti: Different &aStaff &rtypes grant different bonuses to spell power.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests6.title: Craft all three &bSpellblades
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests6.subti: Its like a &aWand&r, but instead of a &aWand&r, its a &bBlade!
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests7.title: Craft all three &bSpellblade Ingots
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests8.title: Craft the hat for all three &3Wizard&r gearsets
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests8.subti: Wearing a full set of &4Fire&r / &bFrost&r / &5Arcane&r Wizard gear will make spells of that element much more powerful.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests9.title: Craft a &eMonk Workbench
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests9.subti: A Villager jobsite block for &6Monks&r. They can sell useful Healing equipment.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests10.subt: Paladin weapons have a built-in &6Smite&r spell, high &4attack damage&r and some innate &ehealing power&r.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests11.subt: Right click with it to summon a &4Spirit Sword&r. There are many other powerful weapons from Spellblades, many of which are only obtainable from a &3boss.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests12.subt: This unique long-ranged weapon doesn't have any &ehealing power&r of it's own, so you'll need to get some from &6armor&r or &6relics&r.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests13.subt: This swaggy hat gives no boost to spell power, but instead boosts your &3critical chance&r and &4critical damage&r.
ftbquests.chapter.3wizards.quests14.subt: Orbs are weaker, but do not have a movement speed penalty when casting and have massively increased &aSpell Haste&r.
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.title: &4Mobs
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests0.title: Defeat a &6Mammoth
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests1.title: Kill a &eDesert Rhino
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests2.title: Craft the &8&lBook of Shadows
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests2.subtit: &3Mandrake Seeds&r, which drops from destroying grass, grows into &3Mandrake Roots &rwhen planted.
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests3.title: Defeat a Demon
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests3.subtit: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests4.title: Defeat Beezlebub
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests4.subtit: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests5.title: Defeat Baphomet
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests5.subtit: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests6.title: Defeat Lilith
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests6.subtit: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests7.title: Defeat Herne
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests7.subtit: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests8.title: Defeat a &dAmethyst Golem
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests9.title: Observe the &6Wise Oak
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests9.subtit: Has over &l300 &rlines of dialogue. Gain his trust by talking to him enough. If you make him &cangry&r, you will face &4consequences&r.
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests10.title: Defeat the &6Elder Copper Golem
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests11.title: Defeat a &bSummoner
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests12.title: Defeat &9The Hirschgeist
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests12.subti: Rarely spawns in Forests at night. Can also be summoned using the &3Hand of Fate&r.
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests13.title: Defeat all 3 &bIllager Magicians
ftbquests.chapter.4bosses.quests13.subti: The &bEvoker&r, &3Illusioner&r, and &9Frostologer&r are found in &8Illager&r structures. They can also sometimes spawn during raids.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.title: &5The End
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.images12.hov: &cEnd Remastered&r reworks how you reach The End, spreading eyes across the world which require you to explore and progress before opening the portal.
Find &f12&r unique eyes out of &f15&r to open the End Portal.
You can locate a stronghold by throwing any End Remastered eye, but be careful - they can still break.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests8.subt: A trade from a &5Master Level Cleric.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests12.sub: Crafted by combining a &dWitch Pupil &7and an &eEye of Ender
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests15.sub: You can't use eyes of ender to find or open a portal. Click for more details.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests15.des: &cEnd Remastered&r reworks how you reach The End, spreading eyes across the world which require you to explore and progress before opening the portal.
Find &f12&r unique eyes out of &f15&r to open the End Portal.
You can locate a stronghold by throwing any End Remastered eye, but be careful - they can still break.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests16.sub: To open, and find, the &5End&r portal, you will need to use the eyes from the End Remastered mod. Check the &9Entering the End&r quest page for details.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests17.sub: Respawned the same way as normal - placing an end crystal on all four cardinal directions on the exit portal's outer rim. The Dragon Saddle can be used later on in the questline.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests18.sub: A powerful, unbreakable anvil that &6caps the experience cost of repairs and enchantment mixing&r. Crafted with &3scales&r from the &5Ender Dragon
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests19.sub: A powerful mob found everywhere in &5The End&r, most commonly in &3Umbra Valleys&r. The shell pieces can be crafted into &8netherite scrap.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests20.sub: Once opened, this strange portal spawns a matching portal at the same location in &2The Overworld&r. Read &1The End For Dummies&r for details.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests21.sub: Found in The &k&4l&r&0&lVoid&r&k&4l &rdimension, which is entered via the portal that is generated when you kill &6The Eye&r. After killing the &8Void Shadow&r, it will drop a Dragon Egg. Stand near it after defeating the &8Void Shadow &rto hatch the egg. You can ride the dragon using the Dragon Saddle, once it has hatched. Press &bY&r to breathe fire while riding the dragon. The dragon will eat raw meat and Orc Skin.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests22.sub: To build an &3Eye Shrine&r, build a 5x5 &5Obsidian &rplatform. On top of the platform, in the center, build a 3x3 layer of &bCrying Obsidian&r. Place an &fEnd Rod &ron all 4 corners of both layers. Then, place the &8Dragon Egg &rin the middle of the &bCrying Obsidian &rplatform to summon &6The Eye&r.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests23.sub: You can also craft several &6Elytra Variants&r. some provide armor, the &3Soul Elytra&r provides infinite powered flight, and &fIcarus&r Wings allow flying upside down and self-powered flight at the cost of hunger.
ftbquests.chapter.9the_eyes.quests25.sub: Found flying in the skies of &5The End&r. Can be saddled and led with Chorus Fruit.
ftbquests.chapter.bosses_and_weapons.que: Locates structures such as &8The Champion's Graves &rand &4The Decaying Kingdom&r. &bMoonstone &rcan be found at diamond level
There are several types of &6Lord Souls&r. They are dropped by certain bosses, including &8The Wither &rand &8&lEnder Dragon&r. Used to craft powerful weapons.
Summoned by clicking an &dOld Moon Altar&r with a &bLost Soul
Summoned by clicking an &dOld Moon Altar&r with a &3Essence of Eventide
Found in the &8Old Champion's Graves&r, which can be located using the &bMoonstone Compass
Used to summon bosses&r from &5Marium's Soulslike Weaponry
In combination with &bVerglas&r and &6Lord Souls&r, it can also be used to craft powerful gear.
The &9Frenzied Shade &7spawns after you have succesfully defeated the &6Old Champion's Remains
Spawns in the Decaying Kingdom, which can be found using the &bMoonstone Compass&r
Found in large &dBlackstone &rstructures in &4The Nether. &rA difficult boss.
Found on floating platforms in &5The End&r. &4A very difficult boss&r.
Summoned by right-clicking a &5Blackstone Pedestal&r with a &0Shard of Uncertainty&r (dropped by the Wither)

Can be spawned in the &4Lich Prison &rstructure, a large floating island above oceans. Once it is night time, place the fragments on the Corrupted Deepslate Center blocks. Then, pour the &4blood &ronto the altar in the middle.
Found in rare towers that spawn in &9cold &rbiomes. Place a &bsoul star&r in each pedestal to summon.
Can be found in Ruins. Each Ruin will only have one &fFragment&r.
Obtained by killing 8 villagers with a &fBone Dagger &rand a glass bottle in your offhand.
Found in rare caves at the bottom of the &aOverworld&r. &dVoid Lillies&r will point towards the &5Void Blossom&r.
Summoned using Soul Sand, Soul Soil, or Soul Stone, and 3 wither skulls.
Used to summon &5Magus&r. Simply right click while holding it, and &5Magus&r will appear nearby. &5Magus&r will only appear in one location at a time.
Use the Prismatic Effigy while inside the &bGlass Ocean&r to fight &5Magus&r at his full power. This is a &ldifficult fight&r, and you'll need magic resistance and &3multiple types&r of magic damage.
Used to perform summoning rituals for bosses from &1Archon&r.
Use it to ward off Hexblades, or open a portal to their dimension.
This enigmatic group of &bSpellblade&r wielders targets any heavy users of &5magic
ftbquests.chapter.decoration.title: &9Decoration
ftbquests.chapter.decoration.quests0.sub: One of the many mob plushies from the Plushies mod.
ftbquests.chapter.decoration.quests1.sub: Obtained by throwing a &8Netherite Ingot &rthrough a &4Nether &rPortal. Used to make an Unobtanium Block, one of the many decoration blocks from the Architect's Palette mod.
ftbquests.chapter.decoration.quests2.sub: A detailed guidebook for the Adorn mod.
ftbquests.chapter.decoration.quests3.sub: 3 block high door. Great for tall origins.
ftbquests.chapter.deeper_and_darker.ques: Used to negate the darkness in &8&lThe Otherside.

Before lighting the portal, you must first remove all &3Sculk Veins &rfrom the inner frame. After the frame is cleared, you can right click it with the &bHeart of The Deep &rthat you got earlier from killing The Warden.
Rare chance of spawning after breaking an &8Ancient Vase&r.
Found by stepping on Infested Sculk
An armored &6Elytra which allows you to boost without rockets.
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.title: &9Dehydration
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.quests0.su: Can be used to hold &bPurified Water
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.quests1.su: Can be hung over a campfire to boil impure buckets of water. &bPurified Water &ris extracted with glass bottles.
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.quests2.su: Place an empty bucket on a &2Bamboo Pump&r, then right-click the Pump a few times until it stops pumping. Shift left click the Pump with an empty hand to take off the Bucket of &bPurified Water&r.
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.quests3.su: Has a &ecapacity &7of 3. You can fill flasks from &9River&r biomes to get clean water without purifying it first.
ftbquests.chapter.dehydration.quests6.su: Has a &ecapacity &7of 6. You can also restore large amounts of thirst with certain rare foods.
ftbquests.chapter.eden_ring.title: &eEden Ring
ftbquests.chapter.eden_ring.quests0.subt: Click on this quest to view the description and read the portal activation guide.
ftbquests.chapter.eden_ring.quests0.desc: To create the portal to the &eEden Ring&r, you will first need 12 &n&6Waxed&r &6Blocks of Copper&r, 12 &n&6Waxed&r &6Cut Copper Stairs&r, 4 &dBlocks of Amethyst&r, 4 &dAmethyst Clusters&r, 1 &e&lGold Block&r, and a &7Flint and Steel&r.
To build the portal itself, build a 3x3 platform of &6Copper Blocks&r. Replace the middle block with a &e&lGold Block&r.
Surround the platform with &6Waxed Cut Copper Stairs&r, and replace the corners between the stairs with &6Copper Blocks&r.
The four &6Copper Blocks &ryou just placed should then have &dAmethyst Blocks &rplaced on top, and then the &dAmethyst Clusters&r.
Light the &e&lGold Block &rwith the &7Flint and Steel &rto activate the portal.
ftbquests.chapter.ethe_bumblezone.title: &6The Bumblezone
ftbquests.chapter.ethe_bumblezone.quests: Enter &6The Bumblezone

To enter &6The Bumblezone&r, simply throw an &5Ender Pearl&r into a &eBee Nest&r or a Bee Hive. To leave, dig to &lY = 0 &ror tower up to &lY = 256&r. Player-ridden animals can be brought into &6The Bumblezone&r by pushing yourself into a &eBee Hive &rwith a piston, while riding the mob.
If you have trypophobia, go into the Resourcepacks menu and enable the Anti-trypophobia resourcepack.
Enter &6The Bumblezone
Find the &e&lBee Queen
Found in Throne Pillar structures. Trades for a variety of resources. Try giving her &eHoney Bottles&r, &4Spider Eyes&r, &fString&r, or &dDyes&r.
Obtain &6Pollen Puff
Obtained by mining a &fPile of Pollen&r. Read quest description for interactions.
When thrown at flowers, the flowers will reproduce.
When thrown at a block, it will create a Pile of Pollen.
Makes pandas sneeze.
Pollinates unpollinated bees.
Spawns mushrooms when thrown at a Mooshroom.
Spawn pumpkin stems when thrown at a Snow Golem.
Find a &dHanging Garden
A great place to find flowers of all kinds.
Locate the Hanging Garden
Find a &6Crystalline Flower
Found in &6The Bumblezone&r on &6Glistering Honey&r and &dAmethyst&r. Opened by right clicking. By feeding it items or &aExperience Points&r, it will give you enchanted books.
Observe a Crystalline Flower
Craft a &6Honey Crystal Shield
Upgradeable by repairing it in an anvil, using &6Honey Crystal Shards&r. Has double the durability of a normal shield at max level. Slows attackers.
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.title: &4Mine Cells
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.quests0.sub: The portal to the &8Prison &rdimension spawns randomly throughout the &aOverworld&r. If you have, at any point, been in possession of a &bdiamond&r, the portal will already be activated.
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.quests1.sub: Spawns in the &1Insufferable Crypt&r. To deal damage to &dConjunctivius&r, you must first kill the tentacles. Can drop the &4&lCursed Sword&r, which gives you the &4Cursed &reffect when held. Don't use this sword in Hardcore ;)
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.quests2.sub: To create an &8Elevator&r, first clear out a 3x3 area of any height. Then, place chains on either side of the shaft. Place the &8Elevator Assemblers &ron at the heights you want the &8Elevator &rto go to. The &8Elevator &rcan be activated via &4redstone &ror by right clicking. Make sure the chain goes above the top &8Elevator &rand chains surround both sides.
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.quests3.sub: The Prison has a portal which leads to the &3Promenade of the Condemned&r. Somewhere in the Promenade is an elevator to an &8Underground Dungeon&r where you can find a &3Vine Rune
ftbquests.chapter.mine_cells.quests4.sub: Once you've found a &2Vine Rune&r, head back to the &8Prison&r and find a &2Runic Vine&r to use the rune on, which will open the door to the Crypt.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.title: &7Miscellaneous
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests0.title: Craft a &6Trading Post
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests0.subti: Used to trade with several nearby villagers at once.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests1.title: Craft a &2Nature's Compass
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests2.title: Craft a &3Trading Station
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests2.subti: Only useful in multiplayer. Allows for easy trading with other players.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests3.title: Craft an &5Altar
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests3.subti: Used to increase an &5enchantment &rlevel on an item in return for a &4curse&r. The materials to craft one can be found in &2Dark Forests
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests4.title: Craft a &f&lSmooth Quartz Elevator
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests4.subti: Allows for easy transport on the same Y axis.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests5.title: Craft a &8Waystone
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests5.subti: Allows for easy transportation between &lany &rtwo places. Longer transport may consume &aexperience&r.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests6.title: Craft an &cUncrafting Table
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests6.subti: Turns items back into the ingredients used to craft them. Map focuses can be found in the Twilight Forest.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests7.title: Craft a &eSeason Calendar
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests7.subti: Tells you the current season. Seasons affect many things - especially crop growth and weather.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests8.title: Craft &2Greenhouse Glass
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests8.subti: Lessens the effects of seasons when placed above crops.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests9.title: Craft a &9Totem of Void Undying
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests9.subti: A totem that prevents you from dying in the void, teleporting you to a safe place. Can be equipped in the Trinket slot.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests10.subt: Reverts &cd&ay&ee&bd &ritems, cleans &6Copper Blocks&r, un&cd&ay&ee&bs &rSheep, and turns &2Sticky &rPistons into Pistons.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests11.subt: To make a &eStraw Golem&r, place a Carved Pumpkin on top of a Hay Bale. &eStraw Golems &rwill harvest and replant crops, and then deposit to nearby containers. You can shift click the golem and then a container to specify which. Each golem will live for 7 days. This can be extended with wheat. If you have an apple in your hand, they will follow you. Every 2 days, they will want an apple to continue working. Iron Golems and farm animals love Straw Golems. Raiders don't.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests12.subt: One of three Magnum torch variants. Prevents monster spawns in a 64 block radius.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests15.subt: Displays damage dealt when hit. Can be equipped with armor to test its resistance, without damaging the armor when hit.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests17.subt: Can make an item unbreakable when applied in anvil. If a normal anvil isn't working, search \"Anvil\" in the REI Search Bar and use one of those instead.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests18.subt: Bounties have varying levels of rewards. You can craft decrees to get new bounties.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests19.desc: &5Anvils&r can be used to retrieve half of the enchantments from an item using &bTomes of Scrapping.
&rThese &btomes&r also have upgraded variants. For details, read the &4Chronicle of Shadows &r
&5Anvils&r can also be used to reroll the rarity of full durability gear using amethyst shards.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests20.subt: Used to barter with several nearby piglins at once.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests21.subt: Any medium sized entity can be put into a &8Cage&r. Right click to release, shift click on a block to place the &8Cage&r. Chickens that are inside of cages will produce eggs.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests22.subt: Any small entity can be put into a &fJar&r. Right click to release, shift click on a block to place the &fJar&r.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests23.subt: Obtained by smelting any &5Enchanted Book &rin a furnace. Used to create the XP Storage block.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests24.subt: Allows for wooden planks to be turned into a variety of other wooden items. Works with some modded planks.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests26.subt: Allows for easy access to your Ender Chest.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests27.subt: Used to turn a villager into an &bOceanographer
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests28.subt: Used to turn a villager into a &5Alchemist
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests29.subt: Used to turn a villager into an &dOccultist
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests30.subt: A reusable ender pearl which gives brief &6Resistance&r after being used.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests31.subt: Read the &8&lBook of Shadows &rfor more info
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests32.subt: Craftable with 6 blaze powder and 3 of almost any potion, this charm repeatedly applies a potion effect when equipped into a &9Trinkets&r charm slot
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests33.subt: Used to make a backpack. You can then place a backpack and sleep in the sleeping bag to skip the night without setting your spawn.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests34.subt: Smaller item storage. Comes in many colors.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests35.subt: One of many crates found by fishing. Better crates can be found with better fishing rods. Shift click with it in your hand while looking in the air to open the crate.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests36.subt: Placing the food that an animal is attracted to will make nearby animals eat the food and then subsequently breed. For example, placing seeds in the trough will make chickens eat from the trough. If two chickens both eat, they will make a baby chicken.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests37.subt: Lets you view the stats of llamas, horses, and other mounts by simply looking at them with the &6Monocle&r equipped.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests38.subt: Makes nearby crops cold with the power of &fPowdered Snow&r.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests39.subt: Makes nearby crops warm with the power of normal fuel sources such as coal or blaze rods.
ftbquests.chapter.oddities.quests41.subt: Collects on top of silt in swamps when it rains. You can probably do something with it...
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.title: &fSeasonal
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests0.title: Craft a &bSled
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests0.subti: Can be placed on the ground like a boat. Lets you slide down hills and other surfaces.
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests1.title: Craft a &cC&fa&cn&fd&cy &fC&ca&fn&ce &fB&cl&fo&cc&fk
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests1.subti: &6The Bumblezone &ris a great place to find Honeycomb!
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests2.title: Craft &eGingerbread
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests2.subti: Used to craft a variety of &eGingerbread&r-related decoration blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests3.title: Build a &bSnowman
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests3.subti: A great way to get into the Holiday spirit!
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests4.title: Craft a &fSnow Golem Plushie
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests5.title: Craft &7Eggnog
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests6.title: Craft a &dPresent
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests6.subti: A great way to give gifts to friends (or yourself)
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests7.title: Craft &9G&aa&cr&9l&aa&cn&9d &9L&ai&cg&9h&at&cs
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests7.subti: Perfect way to decorate your home and christmas tree
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests8.title: Craft a Scarf
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests8.subti: Stay nice and warm this christmas
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests9.title: Craft a &cSanta Hat&c
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests10.subt: Fill it with snowballs and fight your friends! (or mobs)
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests11.subt: Place anywhere, then right click with a bowl to get a serving. One dish is 4 plates, leave some for everyone!
ftbquests.chapter.seasonal.quests12.subt: Who could say no to a cup?
ftbquests.chapter.storage.title: &3Backpacks and Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests0.title: Craft a &3Standard Traveler's Backpack
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests0.subtit: &6Backpacks &7are a convenient way to carry many items while exploring. They can also be upgraded with special abilities.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests1.title: Craft a &3Blank Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests2.title: Craft an &7Iron Tier Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests2.subtit: Combine it with a &9Standard Traveler's Backpack &7in a &6smithing table
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests3.title: Craft a &6Gold Tier Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests3.subtit: Combine it with an &2Iron Traveler's Backpack &7in a &6smithing table
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests4.title: Craft a &9Diamond Tier Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests4.subtit: Combine it with a &3Gold Traveler's Backpack &7in a &6smithing table
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests5.title: Craft a &8Netherite Tier Upgrade
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests5.subtit: Combine it with a &8Diamond Traveler's Backpack &7in a &6smithing table
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests6.title: Craft the &6Storage Terminal
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests6.subtit: Gives acces to your items. Place it on a storage block, or on an &3Inventory Connector&r to access all connected storage blocks
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests7.title: Craft an &3Inventory Connector
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests7.subtit: Connects all of touching inventories into one, upto 16 blocks away. Use the &6Storage Terminal &7to acces all of your items.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests8.title: Craft some &6Inventory Cable
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests9.title: Craft an &6Inventory Cable Connector
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests9.subtit: Used to connect individual storage blocks to the Inventory Network.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests10.title: Craft the &6Crafting Terminal
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests10.subti: Has the same functions as a &3Storage Terminal&7, but has a built-in crafting grid.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests11.title: Craft a &1Wireless Terminal
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests11.subti: Extends your reach for the &3terminal &7by 16 blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests12.title: Craft an &8Advanced Wireless Terminal
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quests12.subti: Allows remote access to your storage. Hold shift on the &8Advanced Wireless Terminal &7for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.temperature.title: &6Temperature
ftbquests.chapter.temperature.quests0.su: Cools you down when held. You can also hold a frost weapon, like a wand or spellblade. Standing near snow or ice blocks also lowers your temperature.
ftbquests.chapter.temperature.quests1.su: Warms you up when held. You can also hold a torch or lava bucket, or fire weapon like a wand or spellblade. Standing near fires, lava, or multiple torches also raises your temperature.
ftbquests.chapter.temperature.quests2.de: Depending on your surroundings you can get either &bcold &ror &cwarm&r.
Taking off your armor, or insulating it, is a good way to combat the &bcold&r.
Armor can be insulated using Mammoth Fur and Polar Bear fur in a Smithing Table alongside your armor.
Blazeborn and Daemon origins do not experience heat or thirst, while Yetis do not experience Cold.
Merling and Siren's restore thirst while underwater while Hydrophobic Origins don't need to drin water.
ftbquests.chapter.the_aether_paradise_lo: To enter &bParadise Lost&r, build a portal with &eglowstone &rin the shape of a &cNether &rPortal. Light the portal with a water bucket. Note that the dimension currently has no structures or bosses.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.title: &cThe Nether
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests1.sub: Found randomly throughout the Nether and near &6blaze &rspawners.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests5.sub: Summoned at a Golem Altar. Find more information in the (craftable) AdventureZ Handbook.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests6.sub: Spawns in Crimson Forests in the &4Nether&r.
ftbquests.chapter.the_nether.quests8.sub: A flying mount that spawns in the nether. Tame as you would any other mount.
ftbquests.chapter.the_twilight_forest.qu: Enter &2The Twilight Forest
To create a Twilight Forest portal, first make a 2x2 infinite water source. Then, place flowers on surrounding grass blocks and throw a diamond into the water.
Enter the Twilight Forest
Defeat the &aNaga
Found in stone mazes in forests. Unlocks the &eLich Tower&r.
Defeat the &eTwilight Lich
Found in forests. Unlocks the Labyrinth, Goblin Knight Stronghold, and Yeti Lair.
Obtain &3Meef Stroganoff
Obtained by killing a Minotaur, found in swamp Labyrinths. Unlocks Hollow Hills when eaten.
Defeat the &2Hydra
Found in Hollow Hills in swamps. Its thick scales resist most attempts to hit its exterior.
Defeat the &fUr-Ghast
Found in Dark Towers at the heart of the Dark Forest.
Defeat the Ur-Ghast
Defeat the &f&lAlpha Yeti
Found in &fYeti Lairs &rin the &fSnowy Forest&r. Unlocks the &f&lSnow Queen&r.
Defeat the Alpha Yeti
Defeat the &f&lSnow Queen
Found in Glaciers.
Slay the &8Knight Phantoms
Found by opening underground Strongholds in the Dark Forest with a trophy. Unlocks the Ur-Ghast Tower.
Make your way to the &f&lFinal Castle.
There doesn't seem to be anyone here yet. At least you can use these cool doors.
Find and use the &6Lamp of Cinders
Use something found up in the sky to break into a vault deep underground. Can burn through the spiny foliage of the Thornlands.
Give the &fQuest Ram&r whatever it's looking for.
ftbquests.chapter.welcome_to_bmc_fabric_: &dTutorial
&eWelcome to Medieval MC!
To start the tutorial, click on this quest and read the description.
This tutorial will guide you through some basic features. Don't worry, it won't take &otoo &rlong!
To start, click the checkmark under the word \"&9Tasks&r\" and then claim the &6Quest Reward&r. New quests will start to appear!
If new quests do not start appearing, try rejoining your world. Do not eat the bread until the tutorial is finished.
Click me!
&2Inventory
Read my description! Make sure to scroll down.
The icon in the top left of the screen is the &aFTB Teams &rmenu. This allows you to add other players to your team.
On the right of the &aFTB Teams &ricon is the &6Quest Book &ricon, which allows you to access the &6Quest Book &rat any time.

To the right of the &6Quest Book &ris the &9FTB Chunks &rmap. By clicking a chunk once, that chunk will be claimed, preventing players and other mobs from destroying it. If you shift click a chaimed chunk, it will become forceloaded. In forceloaded chunks, crops, furnaces, and much more will behave as if a player was present.
At the top of your inventory is a Book icon. By clicking this book, you can review and upgrade &9Attributes&r. Skill points are gained by obtaining &aExperience Points&r.
When you hover over your armor slots, your &8Trinket &rslots will become visible. Some items, such as Elytras and Totems can be equipped here.
Try equipping the &cCharm of Life &rfrom the quest reward in your Necklace slot!
Inventory
&6Quests
Read my description!
&9Tasks &rare things that need to be done to complete a quest. If a task is an item, clicking on it will show its recipe.
&6Rewards &rare what you get after completing all &9Tasks&r. Click to claim.
The pin icon at the top right will pin a quest to your screen.
Quests
&9Important Controls
Read my description! Make sure to scroll down.
Press &bR &rwhile hovering over an item to view its Recipe
Press &bU &rwhile hovering over an item to view its Uses
Press &bLeft Alt &rto Crawl
Press &bX &rto Roll
Press &bRight Click &rwhile crouching to pick up a block or mob. Two mobs can be stacked.
Hold &b~ &rwhile using a tool with the Vein Mining enchant to activate Vein Mining
Press &bG &rto Activate Origin Ability
Press &bB &rwhile a Backpack is on your Back Slot to open it
Press &bM &rto open the World Map
Press &bO &rto view Origin Information
Press &b, &rto activate Secondary Origin Ability, if you have one
Press &bR &rto Ping
Press &bF7 &rto configure Pings
Press &bF8 &rto configure footsteps
Press &bJ&r to open the ShowMeYourSkin armor overlay editor
Click me!
&bRoughly Enough Items (REI)
Read my description! Make sure to scroll down.
At the bottom of the inventory, you may have noticed a search bar.
This is the &dRoughly Enough Items&r, or &dREI&r, search bar.
If you type Wood, for example, the &dREI &ritem list at the right of the screen will show all items with Wood in the name.
Adding a @ at the start of the search query, it will show the items from a specific mod, for example @Adorn
Adding a # at the start of the search query, it will show all items with a specific tag, for example #logs
To favorite an item, drag it from &dREI &ritem list to the left side of the screen, or press A while hovering over it.
When browsing an item's recipes for a specific workbench, you can click on the workbench's name to see everything that the workbench can craft.
For example, if you are viewing the recipe for Sweetberry Jam, you can click the \"Cooking Pot\" text to see all Cooking Pot recipes.
Roughly Enough Items
&5Professions
Read my description!
To view the &5Professions &rscreen, press &bP&r.
As you level up your &5professions&r, small stat boosts will be unlocked, such as increased movement speed.
You can level up &5professions &rby doing the corresponding activity. For example, the Trading &5profession &rcan be leveled up by trading with Villagers.
In &eMedieval MC&r, all &5professions &rare unlocked and joined by default.
Professions
&aTutorial Complete!
Read my description!
The tutorial is now &afinished&r!
Check out &bTips and Tricks&r and &bGetting Stronger&r for a more in-depth tips.
&a&lMORE QUESTS! &rTo view the rest of the quests, leave this quest screen and put your cursor to the left of the main quest page, where the arrow is.
Feel free to join our &bDiscord &rfor any other questions you may have: https://lunapixel.studio/discord
You may want to claim these quest rewards later, once you have storage available!
{@pagebreak}
&aTutorial Complete!
&dRealism
Read my description! Make sure to scroll down.
&eMedieval MC &rincludes several realism mechanics. The two mods which control these mechanics are &6EnvironmentZ &rand &bDehydration&r.
If you are playing on a Singleplayer world, both of these mods can safely be deleted from the Mods folder in the modpack files. You can also open their configs through the ingame Mods button.

When you are too &cwarm&r, you will start to &4overheat&r. This will put a foggy overlay over your screen. This can be disabled in the &6EnvironmentZ &rconfig. Blazeborn and Daemon origins do not experience heat or thirst, while Yetis do not experience Cold.
There is a Quest Chapter dedicated to these two mechanics if you would like to learn more.
&eMedieval MC &ralso includes the &6Fabric Seasons &rmod. Each season lasts 28 ingame days. Seasons affect the growth of crops. Craft a Calendar to check what season it is.
Realism
&cTips \\& Tricks
Read my description! Make sure to scroll down.
&fItems can be trashed by dragging them on top of &4lava buckets &fand then right clicking!
Items can be reforged in an &7Anvil&r. The item needs to be full durability, and you need &dAmethyst Shards&r.
This modpack features &9Chunk Based Experience Moderation&r. This means that, over time, you will get less &aExperience Points &rfrom killing mobs in the same area.
Every &e5,000&r blocks you move away from spawn, mobs will get &b75%&r stronger. They will also drop more &aExperience Points&r!
Depending on the dimension you are in, mobs will be more difficult and drop better gear / more &aExperience Points&r. In order of increasing difficulty:
&d1&r. Overworld/&bParadise Lost&r/&9Eden Ring
&d2&r. &2Twilight Forest&r/&eThe Bumblezone
&d3&r. &cMine Cells&r/&0The Otherside&r
&d4&r. The &4Nether
&d5&r. The &5End
&cApples&r can be equipped in the Face trinket slot to instantly eat them when hungry.
More &4difficult&r structures have better loot.
PlayerEX levels are capped at &b200&r.
&cTips \\& Tricks
How to fight more difficult mobs.
In addition to crafting and looting stronger gear, your 3 most reliable ways of fighting stronger mobs will be:
&o1.&r &l&6Leveling Up&r:
- Access the &aPlayerEx&r Menu from your inventory
- &4Strength&r is a useful stat for any melee user, &2Dexterity&r for ranged, and magic users have their own tab for &9Specialization&r.
- &eLuckiness&r and &6Constitution&r are useful for everyone
&o2.&r &l&2Relics&r:
- These &aRelicEx Trinkets&r can provide incredibly strong attribute bonuses, with &6Immortal&r tier relics providing up to 5 high-level attribute bonuses
- Relics drop from any &4hostile mob&r, and their drop chance increases based on your &2Luck&r.
&o3.&r &l&dEnchantments&r:

- Be on the lookout for rare and powerful &cdamage enchants&r, like &cVoid Strike&r, &cVoid Shot&r, and &cEnigma Resonator&r, or potent &bXP Boosting&r enchants like &bSoul Devourer&r or &bBag of Souls
- Exploring structures, trading with villagers, obtaining a &eCrystalline Flower&r from &eThe Bumblezone&r, and &9enchanting&r with &9Zenith&r are all useful ways to obtain enchantments.

If you're still struggling, or you want to beat all your friends, there is an extremely in-depth and up to date &6build guide&r, including optional videos for different playstyles, on the &9Discord&r: https://lunapixel.studio/discord
&cGetting Stronger
